modShortDescription: This mods adds some changes to the 7 Days to Die. 24 Hour Cycle: Up to 6 hours realtime, XP Multiplier: Up to 10000%, Loot Abundance: Up to 10000% and more.
modDescription:
This mods adds some changes to the 7 Days to Die. Because Claymore was bored and thought, what he probably miss. This time: Options, if you continue or join an existing local game.

## Basic

* 24 Hour Cycle: Up to 6 hours realtime
* Daylight Length: From zero to 24 hours. 0 = Everlasting night. 24 = Everlasting day.
* XP Multiplier: Up to 10000%

## Advanced

* Payer Block Damage: Up to 10000%
* AI Block Damage: Up to 10000%
* AI Blood Moon Block Damage: Up to 10000%
* [Loot](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-loot/) Abundance: Up to 10000%
* Blood Moon Count: Up to 128 [Zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) (Don’t try that with a potato PC!)
* [Air Drops](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-airdrop/): Up to 30 days

## Multiplayer

Party Shared Kill Range: Added 4096 and 8192 meters. Why? Because if you’re in a party, why not share it over the whole map?

Compatibility: A18+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/g0ccgogt6uzc0a5/Claymore_More_Options.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
